mapper.sql: user_file_id, user_file_name, path, user_id, delete_time, create_time, file_id, state
mapper.select: select * from user_file where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR} and user_file_name like #{fileName,jdbcType=CHAR} and file_id is not null
select * from user_file,file where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}and file.file_id=user_file.file_id and file_type = #{type} and user_file.file_id is not null

select
from user_file where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR} and path=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from user_file where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR} and path=#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state=#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} and file_id is null
mapper.insert: insert into user_file (user_file_id, user_file_name, path, user_id, delete_time, create_time, file_id, state) values (#{userFileId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into user_file
user_file_id,
user_file_name,
path,
user_id,
delete_time,
create_time,
file_id,
state,

mapper.update:
update user_file
user_file_name = #{userFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=CHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where user_file_id = #{userFileId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update user_file set user_file_name = #{userFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=CHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where user_file_id = #{userFileId,jdbcType=CHAR}
update user_file set path = #{moveTo} where user_file_id = #{userFileId,jdbcType=CHAR}
update user_file set path=CONCAT(CONCAT(#{moveTo}, #{userFileName}),SUBSTR(path ,LENGTH(CONCAT(#{path},#{userFileName}))+1,LENGTH(path)-1)) where path like CONCAT(#{path},#{userFileName},'%')

update user_file
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=CHAR}
